title: Samson SR850 Over-Ear Semi-Open Studio Headphones
description: Elevate your listening experience with the Samson SR850 Professional Studio Headphones. Designed for musicians, engineers and audiophiles alike, the SR850s deliver exceptional sound quality and comfort at an incredible value. Featuring a semi-open back design, the SR850s deliver accurate sound reproduction with clear highs, rich mids and deep bass. The wide frequency response (10Hz-30kHz) ensures you hear every detail in your music, while the large 50mm rare earth magnet drivers deliver pristine audio clarity. Whether you're tracking vocals in the studio, mixing your latest masterpiece or simply enjoying your favorite tunes at home, the SR850s provide a natural and transparent listening experience. The SR850s aren't just about great sound; they're also designed for maximum comfort. The plush velour ear cushions and self-adjusting headband conform to your head for a secure, comfortable fit, even during extended wear. The Samson SR850 headphones are the perfect choice for anyone who demands high quality audio without breaking the bank. A 1/8"" to 1/4"" gold-plated adapter is included for easy connection to a variety of audio equipment.
